column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
You'd better fucking take resp-- Huh?
I said, take the pill, here, I have one.
You won't get pregnant if you take it.
Why didn't you tell me!? With this, we can do raw sex any time we want!
I thought you knew, they covered this in sex-ed, I'm pretty sure.
I… I uh… I kinda slept through all of those.
A-Alright then, I'll take this pill. Thanks for lookin' out for me.
No problem. You're my girlfriend, of course I'll look out for you.
…Dummy. Stop being so cool at times like these.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: You'd better fucking take resp-- Huh?
You want me to have the baby?
A-Are you being serious right now?! I mean I was asking you to take responsibility there but--
Y-Yeah, okay. If I get pregnant, I'll let you know. I don't think I could raise the baby alone anyway.
